mapper.select: SELECT h.hotel_name, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, h.hotel_phone, i.room_name FROM reservation r JOIN hotel h ON (h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id) JOIN room_info i ON (r.room_id = i.room_id) WHERE r.member_id = 'nari123' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) < TO_CHAR(r.checkout_date) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) < TO_CHAR(r.checkin_date)

SELECT h.hotel_name, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, h.hotel_phone, i.room_name FROM reservation r JOIN hotel h ON (h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id) JOIN room_info i ON (r.room_id = i.room_id) WHERE r.member_id = 'nari123' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) <= TO_CHAR(r.checkout_date-1) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) >= TO_CHAR(r.checkin_date)

SELECT h.hotel_name, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, r.checkin_date, r.checkout_date, h.hotel_phone, i.room_name FROM reservation r JOIN hotel h ON (h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id) JOIN room_info i ON (r.room_id = i.room_id) WHERE r.member_id = 'nari123' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) > TO_CHAR(r.checkout_date)

SELECT h.hotel_name, h.hotel_location1, h.hotel_location2, h.hotel_thema, r.room_price, w.wishlist_id FROM hotel h JOIN (SELECT hotel_id, room_price FROM (SELECT hotel_id, room_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY hotel_id ORDER BY hotel_id) as hp FROM room_info) WHERE hp = 1 AND hotel_id IN (SELECT hotel_id FROM wishlist WHERE member_id = #{memberId})) r ON (h.hotel_id = r.hotel_id) JOIN wishlist w ON (h.hotel_id = w.hotel_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
